channel.description: Recent content in template on deskriders

item.title: Tkinter blank application
item.description: You: Create a blank application in tkinter Python ChatGPT: To create a blank application using tkinter in Python, you’ll first need to install the tkinter package (if you haven’t already) and then import it. Here’s a simple example of a blank tkinter application: import tkinter as tk # Create the main application window app = tk.Tk() # Set the title for the main window app.title("Blank Application") # Set the dimensions of the main window app.

item.title: ChatGPT Prompt for generating a simple two column web page
item.description: **You: Create a simple HTML page with two columns** ChatGPT: Sure, here’s an example of a simple HTML page with two columns: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Two Column Page</title> <style> /* Style the columns */ .column { float: left; width: 50%; padding: 10px; } /* Clear floats after the columns */ .row::after { content: ""; clear: both; display: table; } </style> </head> <body> <div class="row"> <div class="column"> <h2>Column 1</h2> <p>This is the content of column 1.
